tables.description: This is a principal file. It stores information about each food in the database. It contains a description of each food in English and French as well as dates and comments.

fields.name: FoodID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records. This is the primary key.

fields.name: FoodCode
fields.description: Identifier code for the foods. In the 2007b version this was the FD_C

fields.name: FoodGroupID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food groups

fields.name: FoodSourceID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food sources.

fields.name: FoodDescription
fields.description: Complete food name in English

fields.name: FoodDescriptionF
fields.description: Complete food name in French

fields.name: FoodDateOfEntry
fields.description: Date the food name data was entered into the database

fields.name: FoodDateOfPublication
fields.description: Date the food name data was originally published

fields.name: CountryCode
fields.description: Corresponds to the USDA NDB code

fields.name: ScientificName
fields.description: Scientific name of the food

tables.description: This is the main file. It uses information (by linking) from the FOOD NAME table (among others) to identify which nutrients and amounts are recorded for that food.

fields.name: FoodID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: NutrientID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient names

fields.name: NutrientValue
fields.description: Mean value in 100g, edible portion. (The number of decimal places does not reflect the accuracy of the data.).

fields.name: StandardError
fields.description: Standard error of the mean

fields.name: NumberOfObservations
fields.description: Number of samples

fields.name: NutrientSourceID
fields.description: Identifier code generated by the database for the nutrient source

fields.name: NutrientDateOfEntry
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: This is a principal file. This file contains portion size conversion factors. The conversion factors are food specific multipliers by which the nutrient values for each food may be multiplied to give the nutrients in described portions.

fields.name: FoodID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: MeasureID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the measure descriptions

fields.name: ConversionFactorValue
fields.description: The factor by which one would multiply the nutrient per 100g to obtain nutrient amounts per the measure described (the weight of that food in the measure described divided by 100)

fields.name: ConvFactorDateOfEntry
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: This is a principal file. This file contains the percent of refuse, or inedible portion, for each food.

fields.name: FoodID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: RefuseID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the refuse descriptions

fields.name: RefuseAmount
fields.description: Percent refuse

fields.name: RefuseDateOfEntry
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: This is a principal file. This file contains the yield from refuse and/or cooking losses assigned to certain foods. These yields are most often used for food inventory purposes.

fields.name: FoodID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database identifying the food records.

fields.name: YieldID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the yield descriptions

fields.name: YieldAmount
fields.description: Yield from refuse and/or cooking losses

fields.name: YieldDateOfEntry
fields.description: Date the data was entered into the database

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the FOOD NAME table. It contains a list of 23 different group headings (in English and French) based on similar characteristics of the foods.

fields.name: FoodGroupID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food groups

fields.name: FoodGroupCode
fields.description: Identifier code for the Canadian Nutrient File food groups. There are 23 different CNF food groups

fields.name: FoodGroupName
fields.description: Food group name in English

fields.name: FoodGroupNameF
fields.description: Food group name in French

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the FOOD NAME table. It contains a list of several food sources (in English and French) that foods can be grouped on.

fields.name: FoodSourceID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the food sources

fields.name: FoodSourceCode
fields.description: Identifier code for the food sources. Food sources give an indication as to Canadian content

fields.name: FoodSourceDescription
fields.description: Food Source description in English

fields.name: FoodSourceDescriptionF
fields.description: Food Source description in French

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that contains the list of nutrients (in English and French) used in the NT_AMT file, with which it is linked.

fields.name: NutrientID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient names

fields.name: NutrientCode
fields.description: Identifier code for nutrient name descriptions

fields.name: NutrientSymbol
fields.description: Nutrient symbol or abbreviation of the nutrients. They may differ from international nomenclature.

fields.name: NutrientUnit
fields.description: Unit of measure (e.g., mg, g, mcg)

fields.name: NutrientName
fields.description: Nutrient name in English

fields.name: NutrientNameF
fields.description: Nutrient name in French

fields.name: Tagname
fields.description: International Network of Food Data Systems (INFOODS) Tagnames. A unique Abbreviation for a food component developed by INFOODS to aid in the interchange of data.

fields.name: NutrientDecimals
fields.description: Number of decimal places used in the rounding of the nutrient value

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the NUTRIENT AMOUNT file. It contains a list of several sources and/or types of nutrient data (in English and French).

fields.name: NutrientSourceID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the nutrient sources

fields.name: NutrientSourceCode
fields.description: Identifier code for nutrient source descriptions.

fields.name: NutrientSourceDescription
fields.description: Nutrient source description in English

fields.name: NutrientSourceDescriptionF
fields.description: Nutrient source description in French

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the CONV FAC table. It contains a list of measures (in English and French).

fields.name: MeasureID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the measure descriptions

fields.name: MeasureName
fields.description: Measure description in English

fields.name: MeasureNameF
fields.description: Measure description in French

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the REFUSE table. It contains a list of refuse types.

fields.name: RefuseID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the refuse descriptions

fields.name: RefuseName
fields.description: Refuse description in English

fields.name: RefuseNameF
fields.description: Refuse description in French

tables.description: This file is a support or "list" table that is used to link to the YIELD table. It contains a list of yield types or yield descriptions (in English and French).

fields.name: YieldID
fields.description: Sequential number generated by the database for the yield descriptions

fields.name: YieldName
fields.description: Yield description in English

fields.name: YieldNameF
fields.description: Yield description in French
